text: The European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89) is a geodetic group used for the Eurasian Plate. Since it does not move, it is not changed by Continental Drift. The Making of ETRS is connected to the geodetic group called The ITRS Geodetic datum. The group shows continental drift in a way that the movement of continental drift is none. ETRS89 was made by the Florence meeting of EUREF in 1990. Category:Geodesy Category:Tectonic plates
title: European Terrestrial Reference System 1989
